measurements_data.comments: 1 (491.1 tonnes/day); includes household and commercial waste; 491.1 tonnes/day number is a weighted average of waste generation in 10 regions; per capita waste generation (0.73 kg/person/day) was measured for the most populous region, Region 4, while remainder used assumptions based on reference values
